triples.name: Machine Learning
triples.relevance: The paper uses machine learning as the foundational technique for achieving safe decision-making under uncertainties in robotics.

triples.name: Reinforcement Learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning approaches that encourage safety or robustness are a core component of the survey's coverage of safe learning methods.

triples.name: Control Theory
triples.relevance: Control theory frameworks are unified with reinforcement learning approaches to provide a comprehensive view of safe learning methods.

triples.name: Robot Learning
triples.relevance: Robot learning is the primary application domain for the safe learning methods reviewed in this survey.

triples.name: Robotics
triples.relevance: Robotics is the field where safe learning and decision-making under uncertainties must be implemented for real-world deployments.

triples.name: Adaptive Control
triples.relevance: Adaptive control methods allow systems to safely improve performance by adapting to uncertain and varying parameters in robot dynamics.

triples.name: Policy Gradient Method
triples.relevance: Policy gradient methods are used in reinforcement learning approaches for learning safe control policies in robotic systems.
